name: cREDIT
description:
A credit literacy game designed to educate users about credit scores and financial literacy.
It is based on Soviet Russia after The Great Depression

name: Graphing tool
description:
A c++ program that allows user to graph functions and equations.
It is a simple tool that can be used to visualize mathematical functions.

name: Motorola 68k Simulator
description:
A cedar logic program that simulates the Motorola 68k microprocessor.
It is a simple tool that can be used to visualize the inner workings of the microprocessor.
